item.title: Blasting
item.description: We have a spray booth where we perform surface treatment by blasting with fine glass beads. We blast stainless steel or aluminium parts. Through this process, the materialâ€™s surface acquires a uniform velvet appearance. Parameters Value Maximum width 2 000 mm Maximum height 2 500 mm Maximum length 5 500 mm
